title: Executive Order 11418-Extending the Life of the President's Advisory Council on Cost Reduction
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me as President of the United States, Executive Order NO. 11353 of May 23, 1967, entitled "Establishing the President's Advisory Council on Cost Reduction," is hereby amended by striking from section 2(5) thereof the text "12 months after the effective date of this order" and inserting in lieu of the stricken text the following: "May 24, 1969".
citation: Lyndon B. Johnson, Executive Order 11418-Extending the Life of the President's Advisory Council on Cost Reduction Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/306324
